string-array.name: sql_statements_values
string-array.item: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vn_examples_example_fts4` USING fts4(`exampleid` INTEGER NOT NULL, `frameid` INTEGER, `classid` INTEGER, `example`); INSERT INTO `vn_examples_example_fts4` SELECT `exampleid`, `frameid`, `classid`, `example` FROM `vn_examples` INNER JOIN `vn_frames_examples` USING (`exampleid`) INNER JOIN `vn_frames` USING (`frameid`) INNER JOIN `vn_classes_frames` USING (`frameid`) INNER JOIN `vn_classes` USING (`classid`);

CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pb_examples_text_fts4` USING fts4(`exampleid` INTEGER NOT NNULL, `rolesetid` INTEGER NOT NULL, `text`); INSERT INTO `pb_examples_text_fts4` SELECT `exampleid`, `rolesetid`, `text` FROM `pb_examples`;

CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fn_sentences_text_fts4` USING fts4(`sentenceid` INTEGER NOT NULL, `annosetid` INTEGER, `frameid` INTEGER, `luid` INTEGER, `text`); INSERT INTO `fn_sentences_text_fts4` SELECT `sentenceid`, `annosetid`, `f`.`frameid`, `luid`, `text` FROM `fn_sentences` INNER JOIN `fn_annosets` USING (`sentenceid`) LEFT JOIN `fn_frames` AS `f` USING (`frameid`) LEFT JOIN `fn_lexunits` AS `l` USING (`luid`) WHERE `f`.`frameid` IS NOT NULL;
CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS `samplesets` AS SELECT `synsetid`, GROUP_CONCAT(`samples`.`sample`, \'|\' ) AS `sampleset` FROM `samples` GROUP BY `synsetid`;
